transArray.content: The room environment is good, the location is also very good and it is convenient to call a taxi. The reception service is very attentive. The key is that the free unlimited Nongfu Spring mineral water is so refreshing. It is very convenient to eat and take out in the surrounding area.
Thank you for your review despite your busy schedule. Just to meet you. Xiao Ji is working hard every day. I hope to be with you all the time. I look forward to meeting you next time~
